ygData.subject: Re: /assisting
ygData.msgSnippet: OOOH I am soo in agreement with this, I have been SOO lucky lately in cazic I met a pure warrior thats his 2ndary character(he has a 40th level other
ygData.messageBody:
OOOH I am soo in agreement with this, I have been SOO lucky lately in cazic
I met a pure warrior thats his 2ndary character(he has a 40th level "other "
character" we dont talk much about our other characaters. BUT he is most of
the time the "main " puller for my group at all times. When I join the group
even when im the last one to be invited to the group I let them no my rules
for being in the group. IF they dont follow them i e assisting the puller at
all times, I will go find another group. AND now I seem to be leveling like
a crazed madman now. the assist command is awsome. one mob drops after
another. AND 99% of the time i am grouped with my best bud same level
enchanter whom lets us take ONE mob at a time no matter how many mobs are
pulled.

just my 2 coppers pieces. :)

Tuldar 29th bard (for today)

-----Original Message-----
From: Eric Boller <eboller@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, October 29, 1999 12:52 PM
Subject: [eqbards] /assisting


>From: Eric Boller <eboller@...>
>
>I hate when people go select their own mobs in groups
>to attack. With or without lullaby--everyone should
>be targetting the same MOB. So many people in this
>game don't seem to understand.
